tweet: Steps to reduce exposure:  1. Limit KYC     - mining     - accepting bitcoin for goods and services     - p2p trades: bisq & hodlhodl 2. Control your keys 3. Use your own node 5. Coinjoin often 6. Use lightning 7. Consider xmr swaps 8. Learn how to use VPNs & Tor
